configuration_values_schema.title: Configuration for a simple app
configuration_values_schema.description: The app creates a mandelbrot or julia plot

width.description: Number of pixels the image contains in the x direction

height.description: Number of pixels the image contains in the y direction

n_iterations.description: Number of iterations used to render each pixel

color_scale.description: The colour scale string to use when mapping colours. See https://plot.ly/ipython-notebooks/color-scales/ for valid scales

x_range.description: The x_min to x_max range of space in which to render the fractal

y_range.description: The y_min to y_max range of space in which to render the fractal

julia_c.description: Optional constant coefficients a and b (c = a + ib). If specified, a Julia set is created instead of the default mandelbrot set.

datasets.purpose: A dataset containing .json files containing the output figures
